name: We Are Collective
description:
A game where you control a hivemind of Borg-like dudes.

Made by one person in 48 hours for the Game Maker's Toolkit Jam 2021

Controls

  • WASD - Move
  • Light click - Shoot
  • Right click - Join dudes to the collective (recharge this by killing dudes)
  • Esc - Reset

Objective

  • Kill or join all dudes to win.
